p: Ethyl 2-(4-(chloromethyl)phenyl)-1-(4-methylbenzyl)cyclopropane-1-carboxylate (7). Purification by flash column chromatography on silica gel using ethyl acetate/petroleum ether (1:9 9 → 3:97) afforded the product as a colourless oil in 30% yield. 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.39 (d, J = 7.5 Hz, 2H), 7.27 (d, J = 7.9 Hz, 2H), 7.06 (s, 4H), 4.62 (s, 2H), 4.25 − 4.09 (m, 2H), 3.20 (d, J = 15.4 Hz, 1H), 2.86 (t, J = 7.9 Hz, 1H), 2.32 (s, 3H), 1.98 (d, J = 15.6 Hz, 2H), 1.49 − 1.38 (m, 1H), 1.24 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 3H).
